Slime: Sticky stress toy made out of glue, you could request a specific color to be mixed with it or mix it yourself! [Ask for color availability]
Clear Slime: Sticky stress toy made out of glue, this one is clear!, you could request a specific color to be mixed with it or mix it yourself! [Ask for color availability]

Slime + Stress Ball: A bundle contains Stress Ball and Custom Slime
Clear Slime + Stress Ball: A bundle contains Stress Ball and Custom Clear Slime
